t: Krazy Beaver Tools — CB Adventure Supply
s: We are a Texas based Overland Outfitter. Our products include 23Zero, Front Runner, Baja Designs, Hard Korr Lighting, Factor55, Garmin and many more. Come by our store and check out all the Overland Gear we have in stock. We also have a Turtleback Trailer you can check out.

The name Krazy Beaver came about when Jason and a friend were off-roading in an area west of Albuquerque and Rio Rancho known as the Rio Puerco. Jason’s friend made the comment that he needed to name the shovel something that people wouldn’t forget. He asked Jason what the tool looked like.
